pr_title: More routing options for Fenzo/Kube scheduler

timeline.message: More routing options for Fenzo/Kube scheduler

timeline.bodyText: Can you document the intended behavior of this method? I can see it being confusing due to having to figure out how multiple feature guards are composed together.
timeline.author: corindwyer

timeline.bodyText: Can you write a test with common cases for this predicate?
timeline.author: corindwyer
